I'm at the point in my project where I can now evaluate candidates and I sh=
ould be getting the next generation based on those fitness values.  However=
, when I get to the point in my code where I should be doing this (for the =
first time), I get the following exception.  Any ideas?

In produce next ge=
neration loop...
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'JGTL::Loca=
tedException'
  what():  Tried to get a species which doesn't exist (Maybe =
it went extinct?) at /home/garrerc/proj/drexel/CS510/proj/sw/HyperNEAT/Hype=
rNEAT_v2_6.new/HyperNEAT/NEAT/include/NEAT_GeneticPopulation.h:64


Everyth=
ing seems to be working fine up to this point in terms of getting GeneticIn=
dividuals from the population and turning them into networks (on another ma=
chine).  It's just at this point that I start to have problems.  Do I need =
to do anything during initialization with respect to species?
